title: Who engages in electricity conservation and to what effect after real-world, high-resolution feedback? An empirical analysis of Korean households with smart meters
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Hana Kim, Desy Caesary, Jeongwoo Jang, Daphne Ngar-yin Mah
